recipe.title: Chinese Rice Congee with Pickles
ingredients: 1/2 cup Chinese pickled vegetables (pickled radish, cabbage, or mustard greens)
instructions: Rinse the rice thoroughly until water runs clear
In a large pot, heat oil over medium heat and sauté ginger and garlic for 1 minute
Add rice and stir to coat with oil
Pour in water or broth, bring to boil
Reduce heat to low, cover and simmer for 1-1.5 hours, stirring occasionally
The congee is done when rice grains are completely broken down and porridge is creamy
Season with salt
Serve hot topped with pickled vegetables, green onions, soy sauce, sesame oil, and white pepper

recipe.title: Quick Pickled Vegetables
instructions: Pack all vegetables into a clean glass jar along with garlic, peppercorns, and mustard seeds
In a saucepan, combine vinegar, water, sugar, and salt
Bring to boil, stir until sugar and salt dissolve
Remove from heat and let cool slightly
Pour hot pickling liquid over vegetables
Ensure vegetables are fully submerged
Let cool to room temperature
Cover and refrigerate
Ready to eat after 1 hour, best after 24 hours
Store in refrigerator up to 2 weeks

recipe.title: Russian Cabbage Rolls (Golubtsi)
instructions: Bring a large pot of water to boil, carefully remove cabbage leaves from head, blanch 2-3 minutes until pliable
Cook rice in separate pot until par-cooked (not fully done), drain and cool
Sauté onion and carrots in oil until softened, let cool
Mix ground beef, cooled rice, sautéed vegetables, eggs, salt, pepper, and paprika
Place 2-3 tablespoons of filling in each cabbage leaf, roll up tightly
Place shredded cabbage pieces at bottom of large pot
Arrange cabbage rolls seam-side down in pot
Mix tomato sauce, beef broth, sour cream, bay leaves, and dill, pour over rolls
Bring to boil, reduce heat to low, simmer covered for 1 hour
Serve hot with extra sour cream

recipe.title: Russian Buckwheat Kasha with Butter and Milk
instructions: Rinse buckwheat thoroughly
Bring water and salt to boil in a saucepan
Add buckwheat, reduce heat to low, cover
Simmer 15-20 minutes until water is absorbed
Remove from heat, let stand 5 minutes
Add butter to hot kasha, stir to melt
Add milk (hot or cold, as preferred)
Sweeten with honey or sugar
Sprinkle with cinnamon if desired
Serve warm

recipe.title: Greek Yogurt with Honey
instructions: Place Greek yogurt in a serving bowl
Drizzle generously with honey
Top with chopped walnuts
Sprinkle with cinnamon if desired
Add fresh berries if liked
Serve immediately

recipe.title: Russian Pelmeni (Meat Dumplings)
instructions: Make dough: mix flour and salt, add egg and water, knead until smooth
Make filling: mix ground meat, onion, garlic, salt, and pepper
Roll dough thin, cut into circles with glass or cutter
Place small spoon of filling in center of each circle
Fold in half and seal edges, bring corners together to form dumpling shape
Bring large pot of salted water to boil
Drop pelmeni in boiling water (don't overcrowd)
Cook 5-7 minutes until they float to surface
Remove with slotted spoon
Serve hot with sour cream, fresh dill, and melted butter

recipe.title: Honey Nut Oatmeal
instructions: Bring milk or water and salt to boil in saucepan
Add oats, reduce heat to medium-low
Simmer 5-10 minutes until oats are soft and creamy
Remove from heat
Stir in honey and cinnamon
Top with chopped nuts
Add butter if desired
Garnish with fresh berries
Serve hot

recipe.title: Rye Bread with Butter
ingredients: Optional: 1 clove garlic, rubbed on bread
instructions: Slice rye bread into pieces
If using garlic, cut clove in half and rub onto bread slices
Spread generous amount of butter on each slice
Sprinkle with caraway seeds if desired
Add pinch of salt
Can be served plain or lightly toasted

recipe.title: Shrimp Pad Thai
instructions: Soak rice noodles in warm water for 30 minutes, drain
Make sauce: mix fish sauce, tamarind paste, brown sugar, lime juice, and chili flakes
Heat oil in wok or large skillet over high heat
Add shrimp, stir-fry 2-3 minutes until pink, remove from pan
Add garlic, stir-fry 30 seconds
Push garlic aside, scramble eggs
Add noodles to pan, toss to combine
Add 1/3 cup of sauce, toss continuously
Add more sauce as needed until noodles are coated and tender
Add bean sprouts and most of green onions, toss briefly
Return shrimp to pan, toss to combine
Serve topped with crushed peanuts, remaining green onions, cilantro, and lime wedges

breakfast.name: Buckwheat porridge with milk and berries

recipe.title: Russian Buckwheat Porridge (Kasha) with Milk
ingredients: 1-2 tablespoons honey or sugar to taste
instructions: Rinse buckwheat groats thoroughly
Bring water and salt to boil in a saucepan
Add buckwheat, reduce heat to low, cover
Simmer 15-20 minutes until water is absorbed and buckwheat is soft
Remove from heat, let stand covered for 5 minutes
Add butter to hot buckwheat, stir to melt
Add warm or cold milk
Stir in honey or sugar
Top with fresh berries and nuts
Sprinkle with cinnamon if desired, serve warm

recipe.title: Edamame with Sea Salt
instructions: Bring pot of water to boil
Add edamame pods, boil 5-6 minutes according to package instructions
Drain well
Rinse with cold water to stop cooking
Pat dry
Transfer to serving bowl
Sprinkle generously with coarse sea salt
Add sesame seeds and drizzle with sesame oil if desired
Serve warm or cold (eat directly from pods)

recipe.title: Ukrainian Borscht with Sour Cream
instructions: If using meat, brown in oil in large pot
Add broth, bring to boil, simmer 30 minutes
In separate pan, sauté onion and carrots in oil until soft
Add tomato paste, cook 2 minutes
Add grated beets and vinegar to sauté pan, cook 10 minutes
Add beets mixture to pot
Add potatoes, simmer 15 minutes
Add cabbage, simmer 10 minutes more
Add garlic, dill, salt and pepper
Cook 5 more minutes
Serve hot with a dollop of sour cream and extra dill

recipe.title: Veggie Egg Scramble
instructions: Whisk eggs with milk, salt, and pepper in a bowl
Heat butter in large non-stick skillet over medium heat
Add onion and bell pepper, sauté 2-3 minutes
Add mushrooms, sauté 3-4 minutes until softened
Add spinach, cook 1 minute until wilted
Reduce heat to low
Pour egg mixture over vegetables
Gently stir with spatula, pushing eggs from edges to center
Cook until eggs are set but still slightly creamy
Remove from heat immediately
Top with grated cheese if desired
Garnish with fresh herbs
Serve hot with toast

recipe.title: Crispy Fried Tofu Cubes
ingredients: Optional: 1 tablespoon soy sauce for seasoning
instructions: Press tofu between paper towels for 15 minutes to remove excess moisture
Cut tofu into 1-inch cubes
In a bowl, mix cornstarch, paprika, garlic powder, salt, and pepper
Toss tofu cubes in cornstarch mixture to coat evenly
Heat oil in large skillet or wok over medium-high heat
Add tofu cubes in single layer (don't overcrowd)
Fry 3-4 minutes per side until golden and crispy
Remove and drain on paper towels
Repeat with remaining tofu
Optional: drizzle with soy sauce while still hot
Serve immediately

recipe.title: Authentic Sichuan Mapo Tofu
ingredients: 1 tablespoon cornstarch mixed with 2 tablespoons water
instructions: Carefully cut tofu into 1-inch cubes
Gently blanch tofu in simmering water for 2 minutes, drain carefully
Heat oil in wok over high heat
Add ground pork, stir-fry until browned
Add garlic and ginger, stir-fry 30 seconds
Add Sichuan chili bean paste, fermented black beans, and chili flakes
Stir-fry 1 minute until fragrant
Add broth, bring to boil
Add tofu cubes, gently fold in (don't stir vigorously)
Simmer 3-4 minutes
Add soy sauce and sugar
Stir in cornstarch slurry, cook until sauce thickens
Garnish with green onions and cilantro
Serve hot over steamed rice

recipe.title: Egg Drop Congee
instructions: Rinse rice thoroughly
Bring water or broth to boil in large pot
Add rice, reduce heat to low
Simmer covered for 1 hour, stirring occasionally
Add ginger, cook 15 more minutes
Season with soy sauce, sesame oil, salt, and white pepper
Stir beaten eggs slowly into the hot congee in a thin stream
Stir gently for 30 seconds to create egg ribbons
Remove from heat immediately
Serve hot topped with green onions

recipe.title: Apple Slices with Cheese
ingredients: 300g apples (Granny Smith or any tart variety)
instructions: Wash and slice apples into wedges
Slice cheese into pieces similar size to apple slices
Arrange apple and cheese slices on a plate
Optional: sprinkle with cinnamon
Optional: drizzle with honey
Serve immediately with crackers if desired

recipe.title: Chicken Vegetable Soup
ingredients: Fresh parsley or dill for garnish
instructions: Heat oil in large pot over medium heat
Add chicken pieces, brown on all sides
Remove chicken from pot
Add onions, carrots, and celery to pot
Sauté 5-7 minutes until softened
Return chicken to pot
Add chicken broth, potatoes, bay leaf, and thyme
Bring to boil, reduce heat to low
Simmer 20-25 minutes until vegetables and chicken are cooked
Season with salt and pepper
Remove bay leaf, garnish with fresh parsley or dill
Serve hot

recipe.title: Miso Soup with Tofu and Wakame
ingredients: 1 liter dashi (Japanese stock) or vegetable broth
instructions: Bring dashi or vegetable broth to a gentle simmer
Soak wakame seaweed in water for 5 minutes, drain
Cut tofu into small cubes
Add wakame to the broth, simmer 1 minute
Add tofu cubes, simmer gently for 2 minutes
Remove pot from heat
Place miso paste in a small ladle, add some broth to dissolve
Stir dissolved miso back into the pot (do not boil miso or it loses nutrients)
Gently stir to combine
Serve immediately topped with green onions
Optional: drizzle with sesame oil

recipe.title: Savory Cottage Cheese with Fresh Herbs
ingredients: 1 tablespoon sour cream or Greek yogurt
instructions: Place cottage cheese in a bowl
Add chopped fresh herbs
Add sour cream or Greek yogurt
Season with salt and pepper
Add olive oil and garlic if using
Mix well to combine
Serve with bread, crackers, or vegetables

recipe.title: Vietnamese Pho Soup
instructions: Char onion and ginger over open flame or under broiler until blackened
Place beef in large pot with water, bring to boil
Skim off foam as it rises
Add charred onion, ginger, and all spices
Simmer uncovered 3-4 hours
Add fish sauce and sugar, simmer 30 more minutes
Strain broth through fine mesh
Season broth with fish sauce to taste
Cook rice noodles according to package instructions
Arrange noodles in bowls
Top with thin beef slices (broth will cook it)
Ladle hot broth over noodles and beef
Serve with bean sprouts, herbs, lime, chilies, hoisin, and sriracha on the side
